DescriptionData.Title: Vintage Style Victorian Sewing Case
DescriptionData.Description:
Lifting the lid on this adorable sewing box allows all sides to unfold revealing a treasure trove of sewing accessories, with everything you will need to start sewing, it even has a built in pin cushion in the middle.
Why not treat somebody special to this, it will make an excellent gift. Or you could just treat yourself!

DescriptionData.Title: Love To Sew Rounded Sewing Basket
DescriptionData.Description:
A very pretty large rounded sewing chest giving you room for plenty of sewing accessories and it is all upholstered in come gorgeous quality quilting cotton form the Love To Sew collection from Michael Miller.
Why not treat somebody special to this, it will make an excellent gift. Or you could just treat yourself!
Size Width 31cm Depth 22cm Height 20cm

DescriptionData.Title: Slipper Gripper Hot Pink 12' x 14'
DescriptionData.Description:
These handy canvas rectangles of fabric have little feet shaped grippers on the surface and are designed to be used on the bottom of slippers to assist with providing a non slip surface. Could also be used in onsies, socks and pyjama feet.
100% cotton canvas.

DescriptionData.Title: 100m Gutermann Sew-all Thread 972
DescriptionData.Description:
Buy 3 Gutterman Sew-all threads of the same size (any colour) and save 5%!

Buy 10 Gutterman Sew-all threads of the same size  (any colour) and save 10%!

Discount applied in your basket


Gutermann Sew-all thread is the most reliable of machine threads. It may be used on natural, blended and synthetic fabrics which makes it extremely versatile.
